text:
e="preserve">Keith John Austin Asche, AC, QC (born 28 November 1925) is an Australian politician. He was born in Melbourne. He served as Administrator of the Northern Territory from 1993 through 1997. He was the third Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of the Northern Territory serving from 1986 through 1987.
Asche was appointed a Knight of the Order of St. John in 1993 and made a Companion of the Order of Australia in 1994. He was made Honorary Freeman of the City of Darwin in 2007.

annotations.surface_form: Supreme Court of the Northern Territory
Companion of the Order of Australia
